import{useGSAP}from"@gsap/react";import gsap from"gsap";import{ScrollTrigger}from"gsap/ScrollTrigger";import videoData from"../assets/video/main_video.mp4";import"../styles/MainVideo.css";import{useRef}from"react";import Marquee from"./Marquee";//플러그인 등록
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";gsap.registerPlugin(useGSAP,ScrollTrigger);const MainVideo=()=>{const containerRef=useRef(null);const videoRef=useRef(null);//scrollTrigger

borderRadius:"0px",ease:"none",//linear
